General.Name: Chongqing Dima Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. develops real estate properties in China. The company also provides property management, commercial management and service, property service, and other related services. In addition, it manufactures and sells special-purpose vehicles, such as bulletproof vehicles, integrated vehicles, airport special vehicles, emergency medical vehicles, and fire-fighting technology equipment, and other products that are used in financial escort, electric civil aviation, military defense, health emergency, and business markets. Further, the company provides architectural decoration, construction engineering, and other services, as well as involved in health care business. DIMA HOLDINGS Co. ,Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Chongqing, China.
